preWorkoutStretches.name: Band Pull-Aparts
preWorkoutStretches.tips: Activates rear delts, opens chest. Use light resistance

preWorkoutStretches.name: Scapular Wall Slides
preWorkoutStretches.tips: Stand with back against wall, slide arms up/down. Primes shoulder blade movement for pulls

preWorkoutStretches.name: Push-up Plus
preWorkoutStretches.tips: Regular push-up but push shoulder blades apart at top. Activates serratus for pressing

preWorkoutStretches.name: Ankle Bounces
preWorkoutStretches.tips: Wakes up calves and ankles for jumping

postWorkoutStretches.name: Quad Stretch
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Stand on one leg, pull heel to butt

postWorkoutStretches.name: Figure-4 Stretch
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Lying on back, ankle on opposite knee, pull knee toward chest. Glutes and hip rotators

postWorkoutStretches.name: Sleeper Stretch
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Lie on side, rotate shoulder down. Hits rear delt after bent-over raises

postWorkoutStretches.name: Tricep Overhead Stretch
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Reach arm overhead, pull elbow behind head

postWorkoutStretches.name: Bicep Wall Stretch
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Palm flat on wall behind you, rotate body away. Deep bicep stretch after curls

postWorkoutStretches.name: Lat Stretch on Bar
postWorkoutStretches.tips: Hang from bar, let one arm stretch while other supports

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.tips: Start low (12-16 inches). Focus on landing softly. Full hip extension at top

exercises.name: Shoulder Press
exercises.tips: Keep core tight. Press straight up, lock out at top. Control the descent

exercises.name: Belt Squats
exercises.tips: Full depth, keep torso upright. Drive through heels. No knee stress

exercises.name: Alternating DB Chest Press
exercises.tips: One arm at a time. Keep non-pressing arm locked out. Core stability challenge

exercises.name: Close-Grip Pull-ups
exercises.tips: Hands closer than shoulder-width. Pull chest to bar. Control descent. Use assisted machine if needed

exercises.name: DB Bent-Over Lateral Raises (Rear Delts)
exercises.tips: Hinge at hips, slight knee bend. Raise dumbbells out to sides. Lead with elbows

exercises.name: Seated DB Curls
exercises.tips: Seated on bench, back supported. Full supination at top. Control eccentric

exercises.name: Tricep Extensions (2 separate handles)
exercises.tips: Keep elbows pinned. Full extension. Squeeze triceps at bottom

exercises.name: Barbell Curls (pronated grip/fists down)
exercises.tips: Overhand grip (palms down). Targets brachialis and forearms. No swinging
